meanings.sent1: The baby was misfeeding on the bottle, causing him discomfort.
meanings.sent2: She realized she was misfeeding her plants by giving them too much water.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat kept misfeeding the dog's food, causing a playful mess.
meanings.sent4: His misfeeding of information led to a misunderstanding between the friends.
meanings.sent5: Misfeeding the engine with the wrong fuel caused it to sputter and stop.

meanings.definition: The act of feeding incorrectly or improperly.
meanings.sent1: The misfeeding of the fish resulted in their poor health.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the misfeeding of the birds when they started avoiding the feeder.
meanings.sent3: The misfeeding of the vending machine made it dispense snacks randomly.
meanings.sent4: The misfeeding of data into the system caused errors in the calculations.
meanings.sent5: The misfeeding of the baby led to a messy mealtime.
